abstract: Pak Chol-Jin (Chosŏn'gŭl: 박철진; hancha: 朴哲鎮; born 5 September 1985) is a North Korean international football player. He currently plays for Amrokgang in the DPR Korea League.He played in the North Korean team that qualified for the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.
